item.description:
Are you a member of Bill Belew's Blogging Network? If so, this special webinar is for you!

Where: Online!

Please register for Special Event! Online Webinar (Q&A) for Bill Belew's Blogging Network Members! on Mar 21, 2013 7:30 PM PDT at: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/7916709468840264960

New and existing members will get detailed information about the following:

  • Login information
  • Website evaluation
  • Job Board
  • How to get backlinks
  • And much more!

You will also have an opportunity to ask questions about the membership and your blog. Bill and the rest of the staff are dedicated to seeing you succeed with your blog, so please take advantage of this opportunity.

Even though this special online event dedicated to Bill Belew's Blogging Network members, this event is open to all Meetup group members.

See you there! :) 

Please register using this link: https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/7916709468840264960
item.name: Special Event! Online Webinar (Q&A) for Bill Belew's Blogging Network Members
